WHO IS DAN BAUMAN?

Public records
are my passion.

Below is a collection of my best work. In order to preserve my stories, I’ve decided to host the words and visualizations on this website and Github.

Why do this? Paywalls go up. Ten-year-old website script slows your browser down. Content displays poorly or not at all on mobile. By parking the content on this website, I can guarantee your experience is not impeded. You can find a link to the original content by clicking the news organization hyperlink in the byline. If you have any questions or would just like to reach out, email me at danbauman77@gmail.com or DM me on Twitter @danbauman77.
